summary: makes the college dorm room actually fit a mage. and gets rid of that frelling goats head
descriptionHtml:
This mod will spruce up the college dorm room you get upon joining to better suit a beginning mage. nothing too major just added a safe storage chest and a shelf with some clutter. and a spare mage clothes set. let me know what you think.

Oh, and it gets rid of that frelling goats head. your welcome.

[img]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130303221432/elderscrolls/images/5/5c/Mounted_Goat_Head.png[/img]

All resources are vanilla

Installation: drop esp file into your data folder. your done.

Uninstallation: delete Better college Students Room.esp all changers where cosmetic in nature no need to safe save just get your stuff out of the chest and off the shelf.
author: Dracula420
